did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Correspondence, minutes, reports, reviews, financial documents.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
did.abstract: Includes correspondence, minutes, reports and subject files pertaining to Fawcett's tenure as Director of the Statutory Finance and Business Office and Assistant to the President and SUNY affairs.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Special Assistant to the Provost for State-Related Issues, formally the Assistant to the President (beginning in 1987), and Director of the Statutory Finance and Business Office (beginning in 1983).

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence, minutes, reports and subject files pertaining to Fawcett's tenure as Director of the Statutory Finance and Business Office and Assistant to the President and SUNY Affairs.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Cornell University. Assistant to the President.
Cornell University. Statutory Finance and Business Office.
University of the State of New York.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Nathan Fawcett papers, #4-12-3183. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
